about_the_game:
Disgraced

The Western Warfare Pack brings new weapons and gear from the West to Disgraced as you fight for justice in Feudal Japan against the evil Shogun!

Western Warfare Pack DLC:
  • 4 New bladed weapons (Cutlass, machete, bayonet, broadsword)
  • 1 New blunt weapon (Mace)
  • 1 New polearm weapon (Pike)
  • 2 New gunpowder weapons (Rifle - bolt action, pistol - revolver)
  • 2 New Accessories (Christian Cross - Boosts morale and protects against sickness, shield)
  • 1 New consumable (Western medicine - significantly powerful medicine that can heal the deepest of wounds or the worst of sicknesses)
  • 1 New loot item (Western notes - paper currency from Western nations, worth much more than Ryo, but can be exchanged for it, can be found in containers)
  • Headquarters smuggler shop upgrade (The Smuggler's shop in your headquarters is upgraded with the new items added to the shop list)
  • 1 Pistol, 1 pouch of ammo, 5 western notes, 3 western medicine, 10 influence, and 15 Ryo added instantly to your supply cache

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST ACCESS THE SUPPLY CACHE IN YOUR HEAD QUARTERS IN KIBO. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
